title: Home
text: I am a motivated Applied Computing (FinTech) year 1 student at Singapore Institute of Technology. I have hands-on experience in programming, problem-solving, and collaborative project work. A results-driven and detail-oriented individual, I thrive on learning, perseverance, and contributing to team-driven innovation. I enjoy exchanging ideas, sparking creativity, and developing effective solutions to complex problems. Open to exploring diverse roles in business and financial technology to further expand my knowledge, skills and experience.

title: My FYP Project
text: My FYP project was a 6 months internship at Synapxe Pte Ltd, formerly known as Integrated Health Information System (IHiS). Synapxe is a healthcare technology company that provides digital solutions to improve healthcare delivery in Singapore.

title: Home
text:
Quick Facts

Nationality: Singaporean
Currently: SIT University Student

Interests: Gym, creating programmes, exploring new technologies
Skills: R, Python, SQL, Java, C++, HTML, CSS, Java
Achievements: Best Signaller in 40SAR, Green Belt in Judo

title: My FYP Project
text:
Intern Responsibility

Worked in a team supporting the Next Generation Electronic Medical Records (NGEMR) Go-Live Project at Tan Tock Seng Hospital and >10 affiliated healthcare clinics across Singapore.
Provided on-site end-user support for healthcare staff across hospitals and clinics.
Conducted application testing and troubleshooting on end-user devices.

title: My FYP Project
text: My FYP project was a 6 months internship at Synapxe Pte Ltd, formerly known as Integrated Health Information System (IHiS). Synapxe is a healthcare technology company that provides digital solutions to improve healthcare delivery in Singapore.
